full_summary:
# National Project Delivery Office - Project Support Specialists

**Tender Solicitation Number:** 202304088
**Tender Closing Date:** December 4, 2023, 14:00 EST

## Project Overview

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) requires support services for the National Project Delivery Office (NPDP) and NHQ Assets Management. This includes various activities such as project planning and management, collecting requirements from organizational components, acquiring and managing services for removing personnel, equipment, furniture, and other materials, and coordinating with other stakeholders. The duration of the contract will be for one year, with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

**Basis of Selection:**
The bid will be selected based on the lowest cost-per-point.

**Tender Requirements:**

1. The bidder must respect all health and safety requirements for the work locations.
2. The bidder must support the RCMP objectives by performing the activities outlined in the tender documents.
3. The bidder must adhere to all security requirements outlined in the tender documents.

**Security Requirements:**
The tender is subject to security requirements, including personnel and organization security screening and security clauses.

**Trade Agreements:**
The tender is subject to the provisions of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), the Canadian-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Closing Date:**
December 4, 2023, 14:00 EST.

**Contracting Entity:**
Carmelia DaSilva, RCMP, CM& C, 73 Leikin Dr., Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2

## Quotations Process:

To obtain more information, please refer to the attached tender documents. Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at: Carmelia.DaSilva@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Please note that Canada is not responsible for the accuracy of information on third-party websites.**

## Interested Suppliers

If you are interested in this tender, please submit your bid before the closing date. Only submitted bids will be considered for evaluation.

Address for bid submissions:
Carmelia DaSilva
Royal Canadian Mounted Police, CM& C
73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R2
Email: Carmelia.DaSilva@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

## Integrity Regime
